Key Match Events: Derrick Rose scored 25 points in his return to Chicago
Zach LaVine had 33 points and 10 rebounds for the Bulls
The Bulls set a new record for three-pointers made in a game with 30
The Knicks were led by Josh Hart with 24 points and 10 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Bulls to win based on their recent performance
Coach Tom Thibodeau emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
Post-Match Reflections: Thibodeau expressed disappointment in the team's performance, particularly in the fourth quarter
Julius Randle expressed pride in the team's effort despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on Derrick Rose Night in Chicago
The Knicks played without RJ Barrett due to an ankle injury
